<Heading

  children={"Renvoyer un SMS échoué"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/sms/{message_id}/resend"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remet en file d'attente un SMS qui a échoué

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"message_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"202":{"description":"SMS remis en file d'attente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","example":"queued"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
